thread.section_title: Middle East News | Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Lebanon Seeks Foreign Aid to Support Its War-Rattled Economy

author: Sune Engel Rasmussen
title: Lebanon Seeks Foreign Aid to Support Its War-Rattled Economy
text:
BEIRUTâ€”A high-level Lebanese delegation, faced with a tense border with Syria and financial strains at home, is setting off on a three-city European tour to solicit aid from allies who see Lebanon as a bulwark for stability in a volatile region.
At a 40-nation donor conference in Rome on Thursday, Lebanon will seek to bolster its security forces with fresh pledges of support and aid. The delegation, led by Prime Minister Saad Hariri and including his top security chiefs, aims to strengthen ties with foreign governments that...
